title: How would I go abouts writing this essay ? - Quora

response.answer_text: Id do tons of reserach on the subjects in the question, take lots of notes so i understoid the oerson and the other subjects well, think about it all in context of the wuestion then start writing my own thoughts in an orderly firm. Id also look up on the INTERNET ‘how to write an essay’ if i didnt know how.
